GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.15.71
GSD.description:
wireguard: netlink: avoid variable-sized memcpy on sockaddr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.71 by commit c60801e4e2b5602b67ca04cf8c0d196458efd153, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit e7096c131e5161fa3b8e52a650d7719d2857adfd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: wireguard: netlink: avoid variable-sized memcpy on sockaddr
